meanings.definition: The act of converting to the use of diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The dieselizations of the buses helped reduce pollution in the city.
meanings.sent2: The dieselizations of the trucks made them more fuel-efficient.
meanings.sent3: The dieselizations of the old cars turned them into powerful machines.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for dieselizations transformed the entire fleet of vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The dieselizations of the generators were essential during the power outage.

meanings.definition: The process of making something operate using diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The dieselizations of the machinery improved their performance.
meanings.sent2: The dieselizations of the boats allowed them to travel long distances.
meanings.sent3: The dieselizations of the lawnmower made it sound like a roaring lion.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to dieselizations turned the factory into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The dieselizations of the trains revolutionized transportation in the region.
